CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 5, 1966, pg. 1B reads: "Dynamic Danettes Combine Service with Fun...The Pre-Lenton season was given a "shot in arm" recently when the Dynamic Danettes stepped into the social spotlight with a gala Mardi Gras Ball. Approximately 350 guests were invited to the annual formal affair in the ballroom of the Pick-Roosevelt Hotel.  Guests included all who had attended the club's benefit and the ball was given in appreciation for their aid..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight women, including one in center wearing floral dress and corsage, posed in interior of Roosevelt Hotel for Danettes Mardi Gras Ball
